devOnly.title: Secret Stuff
devOnly.description: You need to be a Developer of the bot in order to run this command.

invalidLanguage.title: Invalid Language
invalidLanguage.description: That is not a valid language. Please follow the format of `xx` (`en`, `de`, etc.) or `xx-XX` (`en-US`, `zh-CN`, etc.), while `x` represents a part of your language code.

serverRequired.title: Server Required
serverRequired.description: You need to run this command in a server.
